## Linux shell

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="50%"}
- Linux is an Operating System
- Linux Shell is a Command line interface (CLI)
  + command interpreter
- Takes commands from the keyboard and gives them to the operating system to perform
- Most widely used is BASH (Bourne Again Shell)
- Terminal emulator – program that lets you interact with the shell
:::
